verses.verse: And Elisha <WH477> the prophet <WH5030> called <WH7121> one <WH259> of the children <WH1121> of the prophets, <WH5030> and said <WH559> to him, Gird <WH2296> up your loins, <WH4975> and take <WH3947> this <WH2088> box <WH6378> of oil <WH8081> in your hand, <WH3027> and go <WH3212> to Ramothgilead: <WH7433>

And when you come <WH935> thither, <WH8033> look <WH7200> out there <WH8033> Jehu <WH3058> the son <WH1121> of Jehoshaphat <WH3092> the son <WH1121> of Nimshi, <WH5250> and go <WH935> in, and make him arise <WH6965> up from among <WH8432> his brothers, <WH251> and carry <WH935> him to an inner <WH2315> chamber; <WH2315>

Then take <WH3947> the box <WH6378> of oil, <WH8081> and pour <WH3332> it on <WH5921> his head, <WH7218> and say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> I have anointed <WH4886> you king <WH4428> over <WH5921> Israel. <WH3478> Then open <WH6605> the door, <WH1817> and flee, <WH5127> and tarry <WH2442> not.
So the young <WH5288> man, even the young <WH5288> man the prophet, <WH5030> went <WH3212> to Ramothgilead. <WH7433>

And when he came, <WH935> behold, <WH2009> the captains <WH8269> of the host <WH2428> were sitting; <WH3427> and he said, <WH559> I have an errand <WH1697> to you, O captain. <WH8269> And Jehu <WH3058> said, <WH559> To which <WH4310> of all <WH3605> us? And he said, <WH559> To you, O captain. <WH8269>

And he arose, <WH6965> and went <WH935> into the house; <WH1004> and he poured <WH3332> the oil <WH8081> on <WH413> his head, <WH7218> and said <WH559> to him, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> I have anointed <WH4886> you king <WH4428> over <WH413> the people <WH5971> of the LORD, <WH3068> even over <WH413> Israel. <WH3478>

And you shall smite <WH5221> the house <WH1004> of Ahab <WH256> your master, <WH113> that I may avenge <WH5358> the blood <WH1818> of my servants <WH5650> the prophets, <WH5030> and the blood <WH1818> of all <WH3605> the servants <WH5650> of the LORD, <WH3068> at the hand <WH3027> of Jezebel. <WH348>

For the whole <WH3605> house <WH1004> of Ahab <WH256> shall perish: <WH6> and I will cut <WH3772> off from Ahab <WH256> him that urinates <WH8366> against the wall, <WH7023> and him that is shut <WH6113> up and left in Israel: <WH3478>

And I will make <WH5414> the house <WH1004> of Ahab <WH256> like the house <WH1004> of Jeroboam <WH3379> the son <WH1121> of Nebat, <WH5028> and like the house <WH1004> of Baasha <WH1201> the son <WH1121> of Ahijah: <WH281>

And the dogs <WH3611> shall eat <WH398> Jezebel <WH348> in the portion <WH2506> of Jezreel, <WH3157> and there shall be none <WH369> to bury <WH6912> her. And he opened <WH6605> the door, <WH1817> and fled. <WH5127>

Then Jehu <WH3058> came <WH3318> forth <WH3318> to the servants <WH5650> of his lord: <WH113> and one said <WH559> to him, Is all well? <WH7965> why <WH4069> came <WH935> this <WH2088> mad <WH7696> fellow to you? And he said <WH559> to them, You know <WH3045> the man, <WH376> and his communication. <WH7879>

And they said, <WH559> It is false; <WH8267> tell <WH559> us now. <WH4994> And he said, <WH559> Thus <WH2063> and thus <WH2063> spoke <WH559> he to me, saying, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> I have anointed <WH4886> you king <WH4428> over <WH413> Israel. <WH3478>

Then they hurried, <WH4116> and took <WH3947> every man <WH376> his garment, <WH899> and put <WH7760> it under <WH8478> him on <WH413> the top <WH1634> of the stairs, <WH4609> and blew <WH8628> with trumpets, <WH7782> saying, <WH559> Jehu <WH3058> is king. <WH4427>

So Jehu <WH3058> the son <WH1121> of Jehoshaphat <WH3092> the son <WH1121> of Nimshi <WH5250> conspired <WH7194> against <WH413> Joram. <WH3141> (Now Joram <WH3141> had kept <WH8104> Ramothgilead, <WH7433> he and all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> because <WH6440> of Hazael <WH2371> king <WH4428> of Syria. <WH758>

But king <WH4428> Joram <WH3088> was returned <WH7725> to be healed <WH7495> in Jezreel <WH3157> of the wounds <WH4347> which <WH834> the Syrians <WH761> had given <WH5221> him, when he fought <WH3898> with Hazael <WH2371> king <WH4428> of Syria. <WH758>) And Jehu <WH3058> said, <WH559> If <WH518> it be your minds, <WH5315> then let none <WH408> go <WH3318> forth <WH3318> nor escape <WH6412> out of the city <WH5892> to go <WH3212> to tell <WH5046> it in Jezreel. <WH3157>

So Jehu <WH3058> rode <WH7392> in a chariot, <WH7393> and went <WH3212> to Jezreel; <WH3157> for Joram <WH3141> lay <WH7901> there. <WH8033> And Ahaziah <WH274> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> was come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to see <WH7200> Joram. <WH3141>

And there stood <WH5975> a watchman <WH6822> on <WH5921> the tower <WH4026> in Jezreel, <WH3157> and he spied <WH7200> the company <WH8229> of Jehu <WH3058> as he came, <WH935> and said, <WH559> I see <WH7200> a company. <WH8229> And Joram <WH3088> said, <WH559> Take <WH3947> an horseman, <WH7395> and send <WH7971> to meet <WH7125> them, and let him say, <WH559> Is it peace? <WH7965>

So there went <WH3212> one on horseback <WH7392> <WH5483> to meet <WH7125> him, and said, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the king, <WH4428> Is it peace? <WH7965> And Jehu <WH3058> said, <WH559> What <WH4100> have you to do with peace? <WH7965> turn <WH5437> you behind <WH310> me. And the watchman <WH6822> told, <WH5046> saying, <WH559> The messenger <WH4397> came <WH935> to them, but he comes <WH7725> not again. <WH7725>

Then he sent <WH7971> out a second <WH8145> on horseback, <WH5483> which came <WH935> to them, and said, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the king, <WH4428> Is it peace? <WH7965> And Jehu <WH3058> answered, <WH559> What <WH4100> have you to do with peace? <WH7965> turn <WH5437> you behind <WH310> me.

And the watchman <WH6822> told, <WH5046> saying, <WH559> He came <WH935> even to them, and comes <WH7725> not again: <WH7725> and the driving <WH4491> is like the driving <WH4491> of Jehu <WH3058> the son <WH1121> of Nimshi; <WH5250> for he drives <WH5090> furiously. <WH7697>

And Joram <WH3088> said, <WH559> Make ready. <WH631> And his chariot <WH7393> was made ready. <WH631> And Joram <WH3088> king <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478> and Ahaziah <WH274> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> went <WH3318> out, each <WH376> in his chariot, <WH7393> and they went <WH3318> out against <WH7125> Jehu, <WH3058> and met <WH4672> him in the portion <WH2513> of Naboth <WH5022> the Jezreelite. <WH3158>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when Joram <WH3088> saw <WH7200> Jehu, <WH3058> that he said, <WH559> Is it peace, <WH7965> Jehu? <WH3058> And he answered, <WH559> What <WH4100> peace, <WH7965> so long <WH5704> as the prostitutions <WH2183> of your mother <WH517> Jezebel <WH348> and her witchcrafts <WH3785> are so many? <WH7227>
And Joram <WH3088> turned <WH2015> his hands, <WH3027> and fled, <WH5127> and said <WH559> to Ahaziah, <WH274> There is treachery, <WH4820> O Ahaziah. <WH274>

And Jehu <WH3058> drew a bow <WH7198> with his full <WH4390> strength, <WH3027> and smote <WH5221> Jehoram <WH3088> between <WH996> his arms, <WH2220> and the arrow <WH2678> went <WH3318> out at his heart, <WH3820> and he sunk <WH3766> down in his chariot. <WH7393>

Then said <WH559> Jehu to Bidkar <WH920> his captain, <WH7991> Take <WH5375> up, and cast <WH7993> him in the portion <WH2513> of the field <WH7704> of Naboth <WH5022> the Jezreelite: <WH3158> for remember <WH2142> how that, when I and you rode <WH7392> together <WH6776> after <WH310> Ahab <WH256> his father, <WH1> the LORD <WH3068> laid <WH5375> this <WH2088> burden <WH4853> on him;

Surely I have seen <WH7200> yesterday <WH570> the blood <WH1818> of Naboth, <WH5022> and the blood <WH1818> of his sons, <WH1121> said <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> and I will requite <WH7999> you in this <WH2063> plat, <WH2513> said <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068> Now <WH6258> therefore take <WH5375> and cast <WH7993> him into the plat <WH2513> of ground, according to the word <WH1697> of the LORD. <WH3068>

But when Ahaziah <WH274> the king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> saw <WH7200> this, he fled <WH5127> by the way <WH1870> of the garden <WH1588> house. <WH1004> And Jehu <WH3058> followed <WH7291> after <WH310> him, and said, <WH559> Smite <WH5221> him also <WH1571> in the chariot. <WH4818> And they did so at the going <WH4608> up to Gur, <WH1483> which <WH834> is by Ibleam. <WH2991> And he fled <WH5127> to Megiddo, <WH4023> and died <WH4191> there. <WH8033>
And his servants <WH5650> carried <WH7392> him in a chariot to Jerusalem, <WH3389> and buried <WH6912> him in his sepulcher <WH6900> with his fathers <WH1> in the city <WH5892> of David. <WH1732>
And in the eleventh <WH6240> year <WH8141> of Joram <WH3088> the son <WH1121> of Ahab <WH256> began Ahaziah <WH274> to reign <WH4427> over <WH5921> Judah. <WH3063>

And when Jehu <WH3058> was come <WH935> to Jezreel, <WH3157> Jezebel <WH348> heard <WH8085> of it; and she painted <WH7760> <WH6320> her face, <WH5869> and tired <WH3190> her head, <WH7218> and looked <WH8259> out at <WH1157> a window. <WH2474>
And as Jehu <WH3058> entered <WH935> in at the gate, <WH8179> she said, <WH559> Had Zimri <WH2174> peace, <WH7965> who slew <WH2026> his master? <WH113>

And he lifted <WH5375> up his face <WH6440> to the window, <WH2474> and said, <WH559> Who <WH4310> is on <WH854> my side? who? <WH4310> And there looked <WH8259> out to him two <WH8147> or three <WH7969> eunuchs. <WH5631>

And he said, <WH559> Throw <WH8058> her down. <WH8058> So they threw <WH8058> her down: <WH8058> and some of her blood <WH1818> was sprinkled <WH5137> on <WH413> the wall, <WH7023> and on <WH413> the horses: <WH5483> and he stepped <WH7429> her under foot.

And when he was come <WH935> in, he did eat <WH398> and drink, <WH8354> and said, <WH559> Go, <WH6485> see now <WH4994> this <WH2063> cursed <WH779> woman, and bury <WH6912> her: for she is a king's <WH4428> daughter. <WH1323>

And they went <WH3212> to bury <WH6912> her: but they found <WH4672> no <WH3808> more <WH3588> <WH518> of her than <WH3588> <WH518> the skull, <WH1538> and the feet, <WH7272> and the palms <WH3709> of her hands. <WH3027>

Why they came <WH7725> again, <WH7725> and told <WH5046> him. And he said, <WH559> This <WH1931> is the word <WH1697> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> he spoke <WH1696> by his servant <WH5650> Elijah <WH452> the Tishbite, <WH8664> saying, <WH559> In the portion <WH2506> of Jezreel <WH3157> shall dogs <WH3611> eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of Jezebel: <WH348>

And the carcass <WH5038> of Jezebel <WH348> shall be as dung <WH1828> on the face <WH6440> of the field <WH7704> in the portion <WH2506> of Jezreel; <WH3157> so that they shall not say, <WH559> This <WH2063> is Jezebel. <WH348>
